name: go-to-rewind-timestamp
title: Go to Rewind Timestamp
description: Open Rewind AI at a specific timestamp
author: haseab_

commands.name: go-to-rewind-timestamp
commands.title: Go to Rewind Timestamp
commands.subtitle: Open Rewind AI at a specific timestamp
commands.description: Enter a time in natural language (e.g. '2nd day of march', '3 minutes ago', 'Feb 1 2am', 'yesterday 8am')

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
